mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shebei_name as shebeiName ,a.shebei_types as shebeiTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.shebei_content as shebeiContent ,a.shebei_zhuangtai_types as shebeiZhuangtaiTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM shebei a
and a.shebei_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shebeiName},'%')
and a.shebei_types = #{params.shebeiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.shebei_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shebeiContent},'%')
and a.shebei_zhuangtai_types = #{params.shebeiZhuangtaiTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
